channel.title: CVE Feed for Concerted Action -- Action Network
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Concerted Action -- Action Network

item.title: CVE-2024-25921|2024-03-15T13:00:47.959Z -- Concerted Action -- Action Network
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Concerted Action Action Network allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Action Network: from n/a through 1.4.2.
